plot outline: Shiva, a dance choreographer, is hired by the rich and arrogant Ammu for her sangeet performance. But Ammu gets in trouble when she accidentally records a murder, leaving it up to Shiva to save her life. At the same time Rubina, who had financially helped Shiva once, demands that he love her in return.
title: Shiva 143
plot: When his wife goes missing, Arvind must solve the mystery of her disappearance before time runs out and he becomes the prime suspect.

Shiva, a dance choreographer, is hired by the rich and arrogant Ammu for her sangeet performance. But Ammu gets in trouble when she accidentally records a murder, leaving it up to Shiva to save her life. At the same time Rubina, who had financially helped Shiva once, demands that he love her in return.
